long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the adorable 'Hello Kitty New Tab' extension! Every time you open a new tab, be greeted by delightful cartoonish images of Hello Kitty.

This charming extension brings a touch of cuteness and joy to your daily internet journey. The sweet animations of Hello Kitty, with her iconic bow and playful expressions, will not only brighten your day but also give your browser a unique and whimsical flair. Immerse yourself in the world of Hello Kitty and enjoy her simple, heartwarming charm with every new tab. Easy to install and absolutely delightful to use, 'Hello Kitty New Tab' is perfect for fans of all ages who love this beloved character. Add a sprinkle of Hello Kitty's charm to your day, every day!
Allows you to chose default search engine.
